lead_paragraph: A variety of consumer-focused articles appears daily in The New York Times and online in our blogs. Each weekday morning, we gather them together here so you can quickly scan the news that could hit your wallet.
snippet: Regulators and the mortgage mess, using airline miles to shop and other consumer-focused items from Monday's Times.

headline.main: Monday Reading: More on the Mortgage Mess

abstract: Regulators and the mortgage mess, using airline miles to shop and other consumer-focused items from Monday's Times.
